title: What Are Smart Contracts? Unpacking Today’s Digital Agreements
description: In the digital currency realm, smart contracts have enhanced the financial industry through tokenization, decentralized finance (defi) and other agreements in the form of self-executing code. But how exactly do they work? What benefits do they offer? Here’s a concise overview of smart contracts and their profound effect on trust and collaboration in our interconnected […]

title: New Headteacher Advocates AI Integration in Education
description: A new chapter is set to unfold at North London Collegiate School (NLCS) under the guidance of its incoming headteacher, Vicky Bingham. The renowned all-girls institution, known for its academic excellence and significant fees, is poised to embrace a cutting-edge approach to education. Bingham strongly emphasizes integrating artificial intelligence (AI) into students’ learning experiences, preparing ... Read more

title: ChatGPT vs Google Search Dominance: Alphabet’s Strategy for the Path Forward in Search
description: All dynasties eventually come to an end, whether they were the Pharaohs of Egypt, the Romans of the ancient world, or the Boston Celtics of the 1960s and early 80s. In business, it ends in one of two ways: the business adapts and thrives or gets left behind. Amazon is a prime example of a ... Read more

title: Tech Industry Cheers G20’s Comprehensive Vision for Digital Infrastructure and Responsible AI
description: In a landmark declaration at the G20 New Delhi Summit, world leaders have come together to outline a forward-looking vision that hinges on the integration of technology, responsible artificial intelligence (AI), and robust digital public infrastructure (DPI). This declaration underscores the importance of international cooperation and governance to ensure the safety, security, trustworthiness, accountability, and ... Read more
